data.name: AWS Community Summit 2020
data.description: Highlights from the Manchester AWS Community Summit held in Manchester 2019. Check our Channel to view the talks in full. Our next event will be held in October in London. If you’re interested in becoming a sponsor please contact joe@comsum.co.uk.
